item.description:
Women In Bio Boston kick-off
When: March 8, 2012, 5:30-8:00 p.m.
Where: Fish & Richardson, 1 Marina Park Drive, Boston, MA, 02210
Registration: https://netforum.avectra.com/eweb/DynamicPage.aspx?WebCode=LoginRequired&Site=WIB
Come learn more about our organization and our program plans for 2012 and beyond. We guarantee you'll be glad you did.

Agenda
5:30-6:30 Meet and greet: unwind with wine and food
6:30-7:15 Welcoming remarks by WIB National Leadership and comments from Abbie Celniker, Ph.D., CEO, Eleven Biotherapeutics
7:15-8:00 Speed Networking
8:00- Event concludes

Other Speakers: Phyllis Dillinger, WIB, and Valerie Fremont, WIB
item.name: Women In Bio Boston kick-off
